channel.title: [317] Need Help adding wildy [317]
channel.description: I need help to add a pk/pvp place

item.title: [317] Need Help adding wildy [317]
item.dc:creator: @_James_scape _James_scape
item.description:
@_James_scape wrote:

I dont have anymore 317 sources so im going to try this off by Heart if I remember...

Client.java
Search NonWild and copy whats under it (only 1 Line) and then paste it on the End and Edit the Coords to the Coords you want to have Wild.

TIPS:
Get the Coords by doing ::mypos or ::coords
If you get Errors trying adding a Extra ) on the end of the ) and in between the }

Uhm yeah I tried

but i want wildy?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Need Help adding wildy [317]
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

What I did for my PVP source, is I made a new boolean called

public boolean isInBank()

and set the coords for all the banks, and then made it like

if(!isInBank()) return true;

In the wildy method

(Please note what I just entered is just a template, and will not fit your server if you copy and paste…)

Read full topic
